description.p: A Class_of_activity is a class that has only individual activities as members.
description.example: 'Change lubricating oil' is a class of activity.
'Change lubricating oil for pump p_101' is a class of activity. This class of activity is a subset of 'change lubricating oil'.
'Change lubricating oil for pump p_101 on 2001-10-09' is an individual activity. This individual of activity is a member of 'change lubricating oil', and 'change lubricating oil for pump p_101'.
description.note: The entity Class_of_activity defined in this part of ISO 10303 is identical to the entity class_of_activity defined in ISO 15926-2.
